message.body: WTF
what??
whats with the attitude?
what are you talking about?
see, there it is again
I thought I was suppose to be the jerk
youre delusional
there is no attitue
attitude*
i didnt have a chance to text you back yesterday if thats what youre referencing
of which, i dont know why you would take offense sinc eyou tooka day to get abck to me too
oh, I see. an eye for an eye huh
lauras having a crises and i had to deal with it yeserday
oh, she dumping douchebag
bout time, j.k
no more complicated--he cheated on her--brb though just got a phone call
what a douche
basically
she emailed us yesterday like heartbroken and doesnt know what to do
she was supposed to be moving in with him in boston in like 2 mts
she needs to dump him
so now shes jsut getting a place of her own and doesnt know whats going tohappen with the relationship
I know its not that simple, but thats reality
nooo, not necessarily
YEEESSSS
its a weird situation
look, the reality is, theyve been together for 4 years. if adam did that to me, i wouldnt just dump him. period.
I know I dont know anything about it, but my gut tells me she needs to move on
well see
understood, but its also been long distance for a while, and hes a douche
it depends on how he acts from here on out
he didnt like fuck anyone else, just like hung out with this one girl for a few wks and kissed her
I've never met Laura, but she seems like a catch, and Im sure she could do/deserves better
or so he says.
um hm
Oh she is a catch, no doubt, and she would be snatched up in 3 seconds
i just feel awful for her
thats how i spent the entirety of my last night, besides working out
uh, thats not a good way to put it
whatever, you know what i mean

well, the love doctor says she needs to 'break up' with him, and see what he does. if he cries into this other girls shoulder, then good riddance. if he fights for her, then perhaps it can work itself out
that'll be $200
sweetheart, i would NEVER take love advice from you
and arrived at the conclusion myself already
and she should date, just to see what else is out there.
nah well see when she moves to boston
WHY NOT? I gots all the answers
as evinced by your current love life? give me a break
My current love life is great
well, better than lauras anyway
and why is that?
I don't have some douchebag cheating on me
you dont have anything. period.
what is the status with all that anyway? new developments?
yes, this just in, Im a jerk
well thats definitely not breaking news
why now?
so I send this girl a message, and she writes me back all critical like
haha how do you mean?
Doesn't anyone have a sense of humor?
well did you write her something offensive?
not really
you know how I am
she said I was being condescending and stalkery
hahaha stalkery??
did you message her like 12 times?
then she writes me again, like 20 min later saying how she thinks that based on my profile we would get along and she wished I hadnt sent the message
NO, one time
hahahaha
these bitches is crazy
what did this message say that was so offensive?? do you have a copy of it??
well youre on a dating site, what do you expect?
being on a dating site does not mean you're crazy
oh, and shes my facebook friend
haha
whats her name?
amy
she has 4,000 facebook friends
thats out of control
heres the infamous original message

OK, so good call on taking out the "It takes me a while to write back...be patient...blah, blah, blah..." from your profile. Don't get me wrong, it's cute that you try to act nice, really. I'm sure it's much more entertaining to read messages than respond to them. In order to make you "feel" better about not writing those losers back, allow me to let you in on a little OKC secret: It's perfectly OK to ignore messages. I use to be like you and say, "If someone writes me a half-decent, well-thought out message, I will write them back regardless of whether or not they are a 43 y/o single mother of four living in Milwaukee.". Now I know better. Besides, what the fuck are you going to say? Sure, you could write a message that just says "Not interested" in the subject, but that's kinda like rejection. I'd rather just not respond so then the person could think, "oh, I guess that nice person I messaged the other day died before they could write me back...shame."
*OH, and by the by...I've seen the infamous tummy photo, Amy*
Idk why that last part is bold
what you wrote the first one?
yup
*bold*
i mean your message could have been construed as condescending
ohhhh, if you enclose text in *'s it makes it bold
it could
but why would I intentionally send a condescending message
weird
people are too quick to be insulted
i dont know. but it doesnt matter really if it was intentional.
i agree, but your overly sensitive as well
sure it does
MEE whaaa
(i.e. because i dont get back to you ASAP means i have an attitude)
dont be so quick to assume
thats a JOKE! what is wrong with everyone!
see, thats the problem. It's impossible to offend me
therefore, I dont find that anything I say could be seen as offensive
I wish women would make up their minds. Should I be nice, or should I be a jerk.
dude you are SO fucking out of whack
you dont need to be anything, just be you
you shouldnt need to alter it one way or the other, youre trying too hard
again, kidding. Of course I need to be myself, but I find that I lean towards 'jerky' when I do that, but always in a sarcastic way that people dont notice
haha well part of the problem is that is hard to differentiate saracasm and dick on the computer without meeting the person first
that is true
yep
I do need to tone it down a bit, at least initially
buuut, It wasnt like I was looking for a date when I sent that message
haha well she doesnt know that
besides, did she not get that part about NOT having to write back?
FYI: Im on a dating hiatus right now
and whyis that?
because Im annoyed with it
especially after that merritt thing
and Jen was getting on my nerves the other day
so I am happy to be single
phone, hang on
whats with merritt now?
and why was jen annoying you?
merritt is ancient history
no one new?
Jen was annoying me because she has this attitude sometimes that is just not called for
about what?
its nothing personal that she does to me, its just her overall attitude about everything
she acts like her life is a living hell, but she does whatever she wants
then bitches about everything while raf actually does everything
So long story short, I am glad I dont have to deal with that kind of bs anymore than I do
okkayyy
hoooray for singleness!
jesus
in the meantime I send slightly offensive emails to complete strangers on a dating site
hahaha
ok well im getting ready to head out to lunch so ill ttyl
or when i get back if youre online
I wont be, and shouldnt be now. Drinks?
cant tonight, i got yelled at by caitlin last night for turning her down cause of the laura crises and have been forced to catch up with her tonight after she gets off work
lunch tomorrow??
possibly. I was suppose to be out of town but that got canceled this morning, so yeah
where were you going?
and just text me and let me know whenever then
to my buddies up in PA
ohh
what did you have in mind for lunch?
